summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 1, Block 10, Hill Tract Addition; Lots 8 and 9, Block 6, Law's 2nd Addition; and north 5 feet of the east 75 feet of Lot 5, and the east 75 feet of Lot 6, Block 7, J. H. Nagle's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-302 and 17-246, respectively.
